product_desc:
Objective: Transform CRM Customer Service by bringing Service to Mobile and Social Channels - where consumers are, thus by making Service relevant for the Generation-Mobile.

Audetemi brands a mobile application for users to capture and report incidents, and a SaaS based module for enterprise customers' agents to reach out and help the users reporting the incidents. The mobile application is free for consumers, whereas the SaaS portal is a subscription based service to the enterprises. The business model includes white-labeling the products for enterprises.

The service platform combines natural language processing with virality concepts to highlight service incidents based on future topline revenue impact to the enterprises which the current service processes lack.

The founding team of three boasts a cumulative CRM Customer Service industry experience of 52 years with product, service, and development experience from Siebel Systems, InQuira, Oracle, as well as Kaiser Permanente.
high_concept: Mobile CRM Customer Service over Social Channels
name: AUDETEMI
